languages.text: С годами Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок стал настолько тучен, что уже не покидал своих палат, ведя дела через посыльных. Его грандиозное тело не могло протиснуться на общие палубы, и это было к лучшему. Столь же изысканные, сколь и омерзительные пристрастия, к коим стал неравнодушен Высокий фактотум, не стоило демонстрировать даже членам экипажа Вольного Торговца, являвшим собой вопиющий образец отступничества от морали.

As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.
languages.original_text: С годами Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок стал настолько тучен, что уже не покидал своих палат, ведя дела через посыльных. Его грандиозное тело не могло протиснуться на общие палубы, и это было к лучшему. Столь же изысканные, сколь и омерзительные пристрастия, к коим стал неравнодушен Высокий фактотум, не стоило демонстрировать даже членам экипажа Вольного Торговца, являвшим собой вопиющий образец отступничества от морали.

traits.locale_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok, became so corpulent, that he couldn't leave his chambers, and administered the affairs through the messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze into the common decks, which was for the better. His tastes, both exquisite and hideous, that High Factotum has developed, were too much to show even to the Rogue Trader's crew, that itself became an audacious example of abjuration of morality.

His monumental body could not squeeze into the common decks, which was for the better. His tastes, both exquisite and hideous, that High Factotum has developed, were too much to show even to the Rogue Trader's crew, that itself became an audacious example of abjuration of morality.

As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he couldn't leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both exquisite and hideous, represented a brash example of moral depravity, proving too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

languages.text: 随着时间的流逝，高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克变得越来越胖，甚至根本无法离开自己的房间，于是他转而通过信使来管理事务。他肥大的身躯已经无法挤上普通甲板，这倒是件好事，因为他的品味既精致、又令人恶心。他是作风散漫与道德败坏的典型例子，其可鄙程度就算是行商浪人的船员也不愿目睹。
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: 随着时间的流逝，高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克变得越来越胖，甚至根本无法离开自己的房间，于是他转而通过信使来管理事务。他肥大的身躯已经无法挤上普通甲板，这倒是件好事，因为他的品味既精致、又令人恶心。他是作风散漫与道德败坏的典型例子，其可鄙程度就算是行商浪人的船员也不愿目睹。

languages.text: Im Lauf der Jahre wurde Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok derart korpulent, dass er seine Gemächer nicht mehr verlassen konnte und seine Angelegenheiten nur noch über Boten regelte. Sein monumentaler Körper konnte sich nicht auf die Decks des Pöbels zwängen, was aber auch besser so war. Die Geschmäcker des Hoch-Faktotums, so exquisit wie abscheulich, stellten ein unerhörtes Beispiel moralischer Verkommenheit dar. Sie waren selbst für die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu grauenhaft.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: Im Lauf der Jahre wurde Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok derart korpulent, dass er seine Gemächer nicht mehr verlassen konnte und seine Angelegenheiten nur noch über Boten regelte. Sein monumentaler Körper konnte sich nicht auf die Decks des Pöbels zwängen, was aber auch besser so war. Die Geschmäcker des Hoch-Faktotums, so exquisit wie abscheulich, stellten ein unerhörtes Beispiel für moralische Verkommenheit dar. Sie waren selbst für die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu grauenhaft.

languages.text: Au fil des ans, le haut factotum Janris Danrok devint si corpulent qu'il devint incapable de quitter ses quartiers, au point de devoir gérer ses affaires par l'entremise de messagers. Son corps monumental ne pouvait plus se mouvoir sur les ponts, au grand soulagement de tous, car les penchants du haut factotum, à la fois raffinés et hideux, constituaient un exemple de dépravation morale trop criant, même pour l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: Au fil des ans, le haut factotum Janris Danrok devint si corpulent qu'il se retrouva incapable de quitter ses quartiers, au point de devoir gérer ses affaires par l'entremise de messagers. Son corps monumental ne pouvait plus se mouvoir sur les ponts, au grand soulagement de tous, car les penchants du haut factotum, à la fois exquis et hideux, constituaient un exemple de dépravation morale trop criant, même pour l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Con el paso de los años, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok se volvió tan corpulento que era incapaz de salir de sus aposentos, por lo que prefería administrarlo todo a través de mensajeros. Su cuerpo monumental no podía pasar entre las cubiertas corrientes, cosa que se agradeció. Los gustos del Sumo Factótum, tanto los refinados como los nauseabundos, representaban un descarado ejemplo de depravación moral tan odiosa que ni siquiera la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la soportaba.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: Con el paso de los años, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok se volvió tan corpulento que no podía salir de sus aposentos, por lo que prefería administrarlo todo a través de mensajeros. Su cuerpo monumental no podía pasar entre las cubiertas corrientes, cosa que se agradeció. Los gustos del Sumo Factótum, tanto los exquisitos como los nauseabundos, representaban un descarado ejemplo de depravación moral tan odiosa que ni siquiera la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la soportaba.

languages.text: 年月が経つにつれ、ぶくぶくと肥え太ったハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、部屋を出ることすらできなくなり、使者を通して政務を執るようになった。その巨大な体躯はふつうの甲板には収まりきらなかったが、それはむしろ良いことだった。ハイ・ファクトタムの洗練されていると同時に醜悪な嗜好は、道徳的頽廃をかくもまざまざと見せつけていたが、それは自由開拓者のクルーにとっても見るに堪えないおぞましさだったという。
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: 年月が経つにつれ、ぶくぶくと肥え太ったハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、部屋を出ることすらできなくなり、使者を通して政務を執るようになった。その巨大な体躯はふつうの甲板には収まりきらなかったが、それはむしろ良いことだった。ハイ・ファクトタムの洗練されていると同時に醜悪な嗜好は、道徳的頽廃をかくもまざまざと見せつけていたが、それは自由開拓者のクルーにとっても見るに堪えないおぞましさだったという。

languages.text: Yıllar geçtikçe Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok o kadar şişmanladı ki odasından çıkamaz olup yöneticilik görevlerini haberciler vasıtasıyla gerçekleştirmeyi tercih etti. Devasa bedeni, sıradan güvertelere sığamayacak boyutta olduğundan böylesi daha iyiydi. Arşıkâhya'nın rafine de olsa iğrenç de olsa sahip olduğu zevkler, ahlaki bozulmaya örnek teşkil etti. Ayrıca bu zevklerin, Hür Tacir'in mürettebatının bile şahit olmak istemeyeceği iğrençlikte olduğu ispatlanmış oldu.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, High Factotum Janris Danrok became so corpulent that he was unable to leave his chambers, preferring to administer affairs through messengers. His monumental body could not squeeze onto the common decks, which was for the better. The High Factotum's tastes, both refined and hideous, represented a flagrant example of moral depravity, and proved too odious for even the Rogue Trader's crew to witness.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar geçtikçe Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok o kadar şişmanladı ki odasından çıkamayacak hâle geldi ve yöneticilik görevlerini haberciler vasıtasıyla gerçekleştirmeyi tercih etti. Devasa bedeni sıradan güvertelere sığamayacak boyuttaydı, o neden böylesi daha iyi olmuştu. Arşıkâhya'nın rafine de olsa iğrenç de olsa sahip olduğu zevkler, ahlaki bozulma konusunda aşikâr birer örnek teşkil ettiler ve bu zevklerin, Hür Tacir'in mürettebatının bile şahit olmak istemeyeceği kadar iğrenç oldukları ispatlanmış oldu.
